attributes.action: Keep golf courses open during coronavirus lockdowns
attributes.additional_details: Don’t ban it.  Golf is very safe since the coronavirus measures have been fully introduced and established since the introduction of them since the first lockdown in spring 2020
attributes.background: Debate why golf, an outside socially distanced sport that is extremely valuable from an exercise and wellbeing perspective, has been banned under coronavirus lockdowns

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557167
